Get comfortable and up your chair game.

While a desk is important, I'd argue that a good office chair is the most essential part of any setup. This is the one item that makes or breaks the level of comfort you have while working or playing games at a desk, and if you don't choose wisely, it's easy to end up with back pain. As part of Wayfair's Back to School Sale, you can save up to $400 off select office chairs right now. If your chair is on its last legs, this is an excellent time to upgrade your workspace.

This Wayfair Sale only lasts through Sunday, July 20. We likely won't see deals this good again until Labor Day sales at the end of August, so this is a good chance to save on office furniture if you can't wait until then. And with new tariffs potentially arriving in the U.S. on August 1, these could very well be some of the lowest prices we see at Wayfair for the rest of 2025.

Save on Office Chairs at the Wayfair Back to School Sale

Wayfair Desk & Office Chair Sale

As mentioned, these deals are part of Wayfair's Back to School deals, and if you've been looking for a new chair, it's worth a look. These deals range from just a few dollars to hundreds of dollars off, with some very premium options available for cheap.

There are dozens of chairs available in this sale, so you can easily find something that fits your office, no matter what you are looking for. Wayfair has fabric, leather, velvet, and even ergonomic mesh chairs available on sale, with each of these available in numerous styles. If you want a chair that complements your office as an accent piece, there are plenty of standout options, but you can also just as easily grab a subtle design.

Beyond office chairs, the Back to School sale has deals on bath, bedding, decor, desks, and much more. This sale is set to end on July 20, so time is running out to score a new office chair for cheap. Considering the huge savings here, I would recommend looking sooner rather than later, as these deals might not last long.

Should you buy a gaming chair instead?

While there are some tempting deals in this Wayfair sale, you might be wondering whether it is best to purchase an office chair or a gaming chair. This depends on what you plan on doing at your desk. If you aim to only work, it's probably best to get an office chair. However, if you wish to use your desk to play on your PC or console, a gaming chair could be a great addition. Often, you'll find that despite having numerous enticing features, gaming chairs have a hard time rivaling the comfort and support you can get from a quality office chair.

Noah Hunter is a freelance writer and reviewer with a passion for games and technology. He co-founded Final Weapon, an outlet focused on nonsense-free Japanese gaming (in 2019) and has contributed to various publishers writing about the medium.
